r.d: DB_odbtp is a PEAR DB driver that uses the ODBTP extension to connect to a database. It can be used to remotely access any Win32-ODBC accessible database from any platform.
r.n: * Added vardatasize option for CLOBs and BLOBs. * Added override for quoteIdentifier() method. * Changed DB::assertExtension to PEAR::loadExtension to fix Bug #3684.
